# PythonTest
Small python programs that I wrote to pass the test.

## Question 1

1. See the key below and determine what the sentence is saying.

Key:

> K -­ M

> O ­- Q

> E ­- G

**Sentence**:

```text
g fmnc wms bgblr rpylqjyrc gr zw fylb. rfyrq ufyr amknsrcpq ypc dmp. bmgle gr gl zw fylb gq
glcddgagclr ylb rfyr'q ufw rfgq rcvr gq qm jmle. sqgle qrpgle.kyicrpylq() gq pcamkkclbcb.
```

[ANSWER](question_1.py)
